name: Cryptic Wonders
description:
One day, Apollo Sarchos wakes up in a mysterious place to discover he and 5 other people had been kidnapped and thrown into a place full of monsters and dead ends. Can they get out? Or will they be trapped here forever?

This was made in RPG Maker MV for my First Game Jam Summer 2020! I hope you enjoy it!

Many of the assets used are from MV.

Audio from: MV and https://www.bensound.com (All That / Instinct)

(There are mentions of murder, murder attempts, and censored swearing, so please do not play if you feel uncomfortable to those topics).
